  • Setting up fixtures to test against

    Date:
    11 Nov 2013
    Category:
    automated-testing
    Excerpt:
    One of the challenges testing a system with a large domain and a complex data model is setting up fixtures to test against. Once we move beyond unit tests and want to create real objects with real data - either as part of the setup stage of an automated test or for manually testing - then things become more challenging.
